Shoreline.Meridian, Seattle:
Meridian or Tangletown is the part of Seattle's Wallingford neighborhood that lies north of N 50th Street, near Green Lake. The neighborhood is thought to have been created by real estate agents during the housing boom for branding purposes. Of note are its "K streets": Kensington, Kenwood, Keystone, and Kirkwood Places N.
The concentration of mostly retail businesses on N 55th Street near Meridian Avenue is known variously as Tangletown or Meridian and considered by some to be more closely associated with Greenlake than Wallingford.
